original_text: Now I urge you, brothers—you know that the household of Stephanas were the first converts in Achaia, and that they have devoted themselves to the service of the saints—
korean_text: 형제들아 스데바나의 집은 곧 아가야의 첫 열매요 또 성도 섬기기로 작정한 줄을 너희가 아는지라 내가 너희를 권하노니

sentences.original_text: you know that the household of Stephanas
were the first converts in Achaia
and that they have devoted themselves to the service of the saints
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그들이 성도들을 섬기는 일에 헌신했음을
